op."version" op_version, op.props op_props, op.gid0 op_gid0, op.referer op_referer, op.person op_person from fabodr a left join lily."group" ownerGroup on a.gid = ownerGroup.id left join lily.person clerk on a.clerk = clerk.id left join lily._form form on a.form = form.id left join plan plan on a.plan = plan.id left join lily.org custom_org on a.custom_org = custom_org.id left join lily."user" ownerUser on a.uid = ownerUser.id left join lily.person custom on a.custom = custom.id left join lily."user" op on a.op = op.id

mapper.insert: insert into fabodr( uid, gid, mode, acl, priority, flags, "state", creation, lastmod, "version", t0, t1, "year", subject, op, text, form, formargs, plan, custom_org, custom, clerk, nitem, sum_qty, sum_amount, ntask, nproc, ntrack ) values( #{ownerUserId}, #{ownerGroupId}, #{accessMode}, #{acl}, #{priority}, #{flags}, #{state}, #{creationDate}, #{lastModified}, #{version}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{year}, #{subject}, #{opId}, #{rawText}, #{formId}, #{formArguments}, #{planId}, #{customOrgId}, #{customId}, #{clerkId}, #{nitem}, #{totalQuantity}, #{totalAmount}, #{taskCount}, #{processCount}, #{trackCount} );
